name: Pterodactyl
description: Manage game servers through Pterodactyl's API, allowing for server creation, suspension, unsuspension, and deletion.
author: JakeQue

pterodactyl_url.label: Pterodactyl Panel URL
pterodactyl_url.description: Enter the base URL of your Pterodactyl panel (e.g., https://your-pterodactyl-panel.com)

pterodactyl_api_key.label: Pterodactyl API Key
pterodactyl_api_key.description: Enter your Pterodactyl API key for server management
